duties_responsibilities.duty: Validate DDR, LPDDR and GDDR Cadence test chip silicon for leading edge protocols and advanced nodes.
Bringup, characterization and validation of test chips.
Work with design team to debug problems and performance issues.
Generate test reports suitable for distribution to customers.
Support customer silicon bringups and post silicon queries of our IP and help to debug customer issues with same.
Debug issues with customer chips and boards as needed when they are unable to reproduce Cadence test chip results.
Execute special test requests from design team or customers to measure specific parameters or root cause issues.
Recommend and pursue improvements to our test plan and environment to ensure the highest quality IP is produced by Cadence and minimize any silicon issues experienced by our customers.
Work with design team to understand requirements, fashion tests and review results.
Mentor Junior Engineers when the project need arises.
